DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to determine the anti-calculus effect of dentrifice containing 5% sodium pyrophosphate and potassium pyrophosphate in a triple-mask placebo controlled randomized clinical trial.
DOC.brief_title: Anti-calculus Efficacy of a Dentrifice Containing Sodium Pyrophosphate and Potassium Pyrophosphate in Heavy Calculus Formers
DOC.criteria: 1. Age group 1530 years. 2. Subjects who have not received periodontal therapy within preceding 1year. 3. Heavy calculus formers with simplified calculus index score 1.53 . 1.
